column5: We have a winner!!!!  Remo Carpeneto of Mississauga  is the winner of the www.PeteMaina.com Muskie T-shirt Contest! (Contest Page)  Congratulations Remo!  Thank you to everyone that entered the contest!  -Jen
....Hey, how sweet is that! Congrats Remo (aka Carp).
He won't look any good in it....send it my way instead ! LOL  Congrats Remo ! U lucky bugger you !
Congrats Remo, enjoy
a carp in muskie clothing.  (congrats Remo!)
Congrats Remo. Enjoy.
Congrats Carp.  You'll love it.  We can be twins now  Joey
Carp will have to remane himself to "Shoal Carp" now! Congrates Remo.
Maybe he would rather have a Walleye shirt? We have those too......and a New Year's Sale going on....  -Jen
Good stuff Remo, congrats...
what you can win these shirts? darn and i had to buy mine
Would it help if I told you that we appreciate your purchase????
no    but at least there are about the most comfortable t's and sweatshirts i have ever worn
Good stuff!  Way to go Remo  Maureen

Thanks everyone.  How do I celebrate winning a muskie t-shirt ? Guess I'll have to catch one of the toothy critters when the season re-opens next year.  Hey Wayne, I heard you have lots of pretty muskie lures. If you let me borrow one to catch my celebration muskie, I'll let you wear my t-shirt and hook a fish for you too.
Yeah they are comfy aren't they? I have a 1 of the hooded sweatshirts, great for the weather here! Warm and comfy!  Remo- are we going to turn you into a Muskie man?  Jen
Turn me into a Muskie man ?  Hmmm ?  I have some gear Jen, but usually hook the toothy critters by accident while fishing other species. Guess I can go after them intentionally. I may hook a walleye.
Nothing wrong with that!

Congrats Remo!  Now that my health is in order, if you like, I'll take you out for some muskies when the season opens since we didn't make it out last year.  Then you can get that nice new shirt all slimed up.  Send me a pm and we'll get thing organized.  Fishnsled
That sounds like a plan. I'll be in touch. Thanks for the offer.
Congrats Carp.  Yeah, you should take your shot at the 'skies ... you'll likely get a monster eye.  Pete
